category: National Team Athletesâ€™ Village Operation Regulations/Article 11 (Cancellation of approval to enter the village)
contents: Article 11 (Cancellation of approval for entry into the village) The head of the athlete village may cancel the approval of entry into the village if the villagers violate the compliance provisions of Article 10, and follow-up procedures shall follow the enhanced training operation guidelines. Revised 2020. 10. 23.
